title.full: NEED FOR SPEED  THE RUN Demo
title.reduced: NEED FOR SPEED  THE RUN Demo

description.full: Race for your life in the NEED FOR SPEED™ THE RUN demo. In the Desert Hills of Nevada you find yourself at the heart of the pack. Battle the unforgiving desert heat and technically demanding terrain as you use all your skills to fight your way to the front in the Lamborghini Gallardo LP 550-2 Valentino Balboni. Once past the desert, you face treacherous Independence Pass. The clock is ticking, a mountain is crumbling in front of you and a rival is one step ahead. Refer a friend and race in the new Porsche 911 Carrera S.
description.short: Race for your life in the NEED FOR SPEED™ THE RUN demo. Refer a friend and race in the new Porsche 911.
